title: Hodlshi
author: Hodlshi
content: I'm trying to experience with Vanity Ethereum, but Im not code expert for able check the source is safe or not. could anyone would to share safe github code "Vanity Ethereum" Please. I need help.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: For @OP it's really hard to find some reliable information.However, based on a few searches on bitcointalk. Found (VanityETH) Github Created by MyEtherWalletQuote from: Nestade on April 24, 2019, 02:47:15 PMVanityEth (the one I used in this guide) was developed by "MyEtherWallet".https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/VanityEthHowever, the original thread was deleted. I don't know the reason why the OP Thread deleted the thread, please keep in mind (I still not tested these) make sure you know what you're doing before you make some activity.
